      • ShoppingCart

        public ShoppingCart()

    • Method Detail

      • addProductToShoppingCart

        public void addProductToShoppingCart(Products product)
        Allows a product to be added to the shopping cart. Checks to make sure that the product is not already in the shopping cart. If it is, gets the products current quantity then adds +1 to it to increase the shopping cart quantity of that product.
        Parameters:
        product - the product that is being added to the shopping cart

      • addProductToShoppingCart

        public void addProductToShoppingCart(Products product,
                                     Integer quantity)
        Overloaded method that allows a shopper to specify the quantity of products they want to purchase. Also checks if the product they are looking to buy is currently in the shopping cart. If it is, then it gets the current quantity and adds it to the quantity they are looking to purchase.
        Parameters:
        product - the product the customer wants to add to their shopping cart
        quantity - the quantity of the product they want to buy

      • checkAvailability

        public Boolean checkAvailability(Products product,
                                 Integer quantity)
        Checks if the current inventory has enough product left to sell the requested quantity. If it does not, the seller will be greeted with a message.
        Parameters:
        product - the product requested to purchase
        quantity - the quantity the customer wants to purchase
        Returns:
        a true or false depending on availability

      • checkCurrentAvailabilityOfGroceryItems

        public Integer checkCurrentAvailabilityOfGroceryItems(Products product)
        Checks the current availability of the specific grocery item.
        Parameters:
        product - the product to check for current inventory for
        Returns:
        the quantity of the product in the shopping cart

      • removeItemFromCart

        public void removeItemFromCart(Products groceryProduct)
        Removes an item from the cart.
        Parameters:
        groceryProduct - a specific product to remove from the cart

      • getShoppingCart

        public HashMap<Products,Integer> getShoppingCart()
        Gets the current Shopping Cart.
        Returns:
        the shopping cart
